concept.title: LDAP is not working
concept.shortdesc: If the LDAP certificate check fails when you are creating an LDAP configuration object, you might need to enable DNS.

conbody.section:
LDAP certificate check fails when you are creating an LDAP connection by using ldaps://When you are creating an LDAP connection and specifying a URL that starts with ldaps://, you might see the following message:
Failed to bind with the LDAP server: Can't contact LDAP server. The error code is -1.If you see this message, ensure that you enable DNS by adding a DNS entry to resolve the IP address of the LDAP server.
